Instance.description: A Picker Interaction that changes the name of the interaction and bypasses the picker if only one option is available.

Tunable.name: force_show_dialog_when_single_choice
Tunable.display: Force Show Dialog When Single Choice
Tunable.description: If true, shows dialog even if there's only one possible choice

TunableVariant.name: single_choice_display_name
TunableVariant.description: The name of the interaction if only one option is available. There should be a single token for the item that's used. The token will be replaced with the name of a Sim in Sim Pickers, or an object for recipes, etc. Picked Sim/Picked Object participants can be used as display name tokens.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The name of the interaction if only one option is available. There should be a single token for the item that's used. The token will be replaced with the name of a Sim in Sim Pickers, or an object for recipes, etc. Picked Sim/Picked Object participants can be used as display name tokens.

TunableVariant.name: single_choice_display_name_overrides
TunableVariant.description: Set name modifiers or random names.

TunableVariant.name: enabled
TunableVariant.description: Set name modifiers or random names.

TunableTuple.name: random
TunableTuple.description: A random display name will be selected. A timeout determines how long it will take a for a new name to be generated given the same input arguments.

TunableList.name: overrides
TunableList.description: A list of random strings and icons to select randomly using their weights. Will only select options whose tests pass.

TunableVariant.name: new_display_name
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, we will override the display name. Sometimes you might not want to do this, such as with crafting interactions that show the recipe name.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The localized name of this interaction. it takes two tokens, the actor (0) and target object (1) of the interaction.

TunableVariant.name: new_display_tooltip
TunableVariant.description: Tooltip to show on this pie menu option.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may use tokens.

Tunable.name: new_pie_menu_category
Tunable.description: Pie menu category to put interaction under.

TunableVariant.name: new_pie_menu_icon
TunableVariant.description: If this display name overrides the default display name, this will be the icon that is shown. If this is not tuned then the default pie menu icon for this interaction will be used.

TunableVariant.name: enabled
TunableVariant.description: The icon to display in the pie menu.

Tunable.name: career_reference
Tunable.description: The Career to override the icon.

TunableList.name: participant_type
TunableList.description: The Participant who owns the career.

TunableList.name: participant_type
TunableList.description: The Participant who owns the small business we want to get the icon from.

TunableList.name: participant_type
TunableList.description: The Participant who owns the lifestyle brand we want to use.

TunableTuple.name: participant
TunableTuple.description: The Sim who's thumbnail will be used.

TunableTuple.name: privacy
TunableTuple.description: Search an interaction's privacy liability to find violating Sims and randomly select one to display an icon of.

TunableList.name: participant_type
TunableList.description: The Participant who's ranked statistic we want to get.

Tunable.name: ranked_statistic
Tunable.description: The statistic to find the icon of.

TunableTuple.name: resource_key
TunableTuple.description: The icon image to be displayed.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The icon image to be displayed.

TunableList.name: participant_type
TunableList.description: The Participant is secret for which we want to get the icon from.

TunableList.name: participant_type
TunableList.description: The Participant who owns the small business we want to get the icon from.

TunableList.name: participant_type
TunableList.description: We use this participant's holiday tracker to get the icon.

TunableVariant.name: parent_name
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, we will insert the name into this parent string in the pie menu.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The localized parent name of this interaction. token 0 is actor, token 1 is normal pie name

TdescFragTag.name: test
TdescFragTag.description: The test to run to see if the display_name can be overwritten by this random choice.

Tunable.name: weight
Tunable.description: The weight to apply to this option when randomly selecting.

Tunable.name: timeout
Tunable.description: The time it will take for a new string to be generated given the same set of data.

TunableTuple.name: testable
TunableTuple.description: The first test in this list which passes will be the new display name show to the player. If none pass the tuned, None is returned.

TunableList.name: overrides
TunableList.description: Potential name overrides for this interaction. The first test in this list which passes will be the new display name show to the player. If none pass the tuned display_name will be used.

TunableTuple.description: A tuple of a test and the name that would be chosen if the test passes.

TunableVariant.name: new_display_name
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, we will override the display name. Sometimes you might not want to do this, such as with crafting interactions that show the recipe name.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The localized name of this interaction. it takes two tokens, the actor (0) and target object (1) of the interaction.

TunableVariant.name: new_display_tooltip
TunableVariant.description: Tooltip to show on this pie menu option.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may use tokens.

Tunable.description: Pie menu category to put interaction under.

TunableVariant.name: new_pie_menu_icon
TunableVariant.description: If this display name overrides the default display name, this will be the icon that is shown. If this is not tuned then the default pie menu icon for this interaction will be used.

TunableVariant.name: enabled
TunableVariant.description: The icon to display in the pie menu.

Tunable.description: The Career to override the icon.

TunableList.name: participant_type
TunableList.description: The Participant who owns the career.

TunableList.description: The Participant who owns the small business we want to get the icon from.

TunableList.name: participant_type
TunableList.description: The Participant who owns the lifestyle brand we want to use.

TunableTuple.name: participant
TunableTuple.description: The Sim who's thumbnail will be used.

TunableList.name: participant_type
TunableList.description: The Participant who's ranked statistic we want to get.

Tunable.name: ranked_statistic
Tunable.description: The statistic to find the icon of.

TunableTuple.description: The icon image to be displayed.

Tunable.description: The icon image to be displayed.

TunableList.description: The Participant is secret for which we want to get the icon from.

TunableList.description: The Participant who owns the small business we want to get the icon from.

TunableList.name: participant_type
TunableList.description: We use this participant's holiday tracker to get the icon.

TunableVariant.name: parent_name
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, we will insert the name into this parent string in the pie menu.

Tunable.name: enabled

TdescFragTag.name: test
TdescFragTag.description: The test to run to see if the display_name should be overridden.
